description: Get timely U.S. weather alerts and precise local forecasts. Monitor severe conditions, plan travel, and make day-to-day decisions with confidence. Stay informed with concise, up-to-date outlooks for your locations.

capabilities.name: get_alerts
capabilities.description:
Get weather alerts for a US state.

    Args:
        state: Two-letter US state code (e.g. CA, NY)

capabilities.name: get_forecast
capabilities.description:
Get weather forecast for a location.

    Args:
        latitude: Latitude of the location
        longitude: Longitude of the location
